English: election of members of the European Parliament
(early) elections caused by the parliament being dissolved
to go vote, literally "to visit the ballot box"
single-member election / list vote, list system vote
to be a candidate in the elections

to get to know the candidates
to believe the election / campaign promises

to vote by mail from abroad
